original_text: The law of truth was in his mouth, and iniquity was not found in his lips: he walked with me in peace and equity, and did turn many away from iniquity.
korean_text: 그의 입에는 진리의 법이 있었고 그의 입술에는 불의함이 없었으며 그가 화평함과 정직함으로 나와 동행하며 많은 사람을 돌이켜 죄악에서 떠나게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The law of truth was in his mouth
and iniquity was not found in his lips
he walked with me in peace and equity
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나와 함께 평화와 공정으로 행하였고

sentences.original_text: and did turn many away from iniquity
